content.text:
Objective: Automatically analyze customer support ticket data to generate a comprehensive summary of their recent support history, identifying critical issues, patterns, and customer satisfaction indicators.
Input Data Structure:
[
  {
    "comments": [
      {
        "id": "unique_comment_id",
        "author_id": "person_who_wrote_comment", 
        "plain_body": "text_content_of_comment",
        "attachments": [{"file_name": "attachment_name"}],
        "viaChannel": "communication_channel"
      }
    ],
    "count": "total_comment_count",
    "viaChannel": "ticket_channel",
    "generated_timestamp": "utc_timestamp_seconds",
    "subject": "ticket_subject_line",
    "description": "ticket_description", 
    "priority": "ticket_priority_level",
    "status": "ticket_status",
    "requester_id": "customer_id"
  }
]

Analysis Instructions:

Extract Key Information:

Company/customer name from comments content
Primary users and their roles
Account tenure indicators


Identify Critical Issues:

Recurring problems (same issue across multiple tickets)
High-priority tickets
Issues requiring escalation to Tier 2/development
Problems affecting core business functions


Categorize Issues by Type:

Integration problems (QuickBooks, payment processors, etc.)
Product functionality bugs
Feature requests and limitations
Account/billing issues
Mobile app problems
Reporting/data issues


Assess Customer Satisfaction Indicators:

Response sentiment in comments
Escalation frequency
Issue resolution timeframes
Customer cooperation level
Repeat contact patterns


Generate Summary Sections:

Customer Overview: Basic info and account type
Critical/Recurring Issues: Major problems with timeline and impact
Issue Categories: Organized by functional area
Satisfaction Assessment: Customer experience indicators
Recent Trends: Current state and trajectory
Account Health: Overall risk assessment and recommendations



Output Format:
Structured markdown summary with clear headings, bullet points for key details, and assessment indicators (High/Medium/Low risk levels, resolution status, etc.).
Key Focus Areas:

Prioritize issues affecting revenue/core business operations
Flag patterns indicating product bugs vs. user education needs
Identify opportunities for proactive customer success outreach
Highlight customers at risk of churn vs. stable long-term users


The response text should be formatted to escape the quotes, new lines, special characters

Data to analyze: {{1.data}}
